reference.title: Key Properties dialog
reference.shortdesc: Allows you to see the various properties of a key.

section.p: This dialog is displayed when you select a key and then click (View Key Properties) in the Signing and Keys view (or when you right-click the key and select View Key Properties).

strow.stentry: A unique name to be given to this key pair. Key pairs are identified by alias within the keystore.
The name of the company you are working for.
The company branch or division you are working for.
The full name of your city or locality. For instance, "New York".
Your state or province. This should be a full name. For instance, "California".
Select your country from the list.
The date (and time) that the key was created.

The date (and time) when the key will expire (and is thus no longer valid). Although an app signed with a key that has since expired will continue to launch, users won't be able to download or update an app signed with an expired key.
